document.full_text: a private diplomatic mission to libya by a former u.s. congressman, who wanted to meet col. muammar el-qaddafi and convince him to step aside, was paid for by two houston businessmen whose firm brokers oil and gas deals in unstable countries.
document.title: the lede: houston oil lobbyists paid for former congressman's libya mission
lines_and_colors: a private diplomatic mission to libya by a former u.s. congressman, who wanted to meet col. muammar el-qaddafi and convince him to step aside, was paid for by two houston businessmen whose firm brokers oil and gas deals in unstable countries.
